title: When Stars Align
subtitle: Story-driven 3D open world platformer. Here setup the entire project structure and implemented the whole gameplay logic including Player Controls, Companion Behavior, Input System, Event System, Interaction, Dialog, Localization, Day/Night, World Streaming, UI, Save/Load, Audio, NPC, Quests, Respawn.

title: Lessing Yard
subtitle: Gamified learning platform for students and teachers. In this project, I set up the entire project and app structure on the frontend. I implemented the design and logic for the entire navigation flow (registered/unregistered), onboarding, avatar wardrobe, home screen, settings screen, badge system, ranking system, shop system, mini-games, QR code reader, map, as well as the integration of the backend, multiplayer (via Socket.io), localization, and state management (Redux).

title: Capybaradise
subtitle: Endless 3D-Stacking Game, where you stack as many capybaras as possible with the help of a friendly goose. Here I setup the entire project and implemented the gameplay stacking logic, flying mechanics, camera, UI, app flow, audio, score and online leaderboard.

title: When Stars Fall
subtitle: Rhythm Game with custom built touch sensitive controller. Here i was responsible for the audio design and implementation, part of the gameflow (e.g. spawning planets, showing endscore) and UI, as well as bugfixing.
